title: New: Main Attrakionz – Focalin prod. by Tyler Bisson
body:
The Oakland cloud-rap duo **[Main Attrakionz](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13325-new-main-attrakionz-%e2%80%93-brock-lesnar/ "New: Main Attrakionz – Brock Lesnar")** have just announced their US tour, ranging from Feburary to March and ending up in SXSW. To celebrate they’re dropped a new track, the very definition of ‘Cloud Rap’, it’s a hazy and souring delight.

Stream the track and check the tour dates below.

02-10 Claremont, CA – Pomona College  
02-19 Miami, FL – Grand Central  
03-01 Boston, MA – Middle East Upstairs  
03-02 New London, CT – Connecticut College  
03-03 Bronxville, NY – Sarah Lawrence College  
03-04 Brooklyn, NY – Glasslands Gallery  
03-05 New York, NY – Webster Hall Studio  
03-06 Richmond, VA – Strange Matter  
03-07 Greensboro, NC – Longshanks  
03-08 Oxford, MS – Proud Larry’s  
03-10 Denton, TX – 35 Denton Festival  
03-12-17 Austin, TX – SXSW
